```{r}
# devtools::install_github("scienceverse/metacheck")
library(metacheck)
```

Define paper

```{r}
paper <- read(demoxml())
```

Get DOI check

```{r}
doi_mod <- module_run(paper, "ref_doi_check")
doi_table <- doi_mod$table
```
```{r}

```


Get accuracy check

```{r}
accuracy_mod <- module_run(paper, "ref_accuracy")
accuracy_table <- accuracy_mod$table
```


```{r}
accuracy_table |> dplyr::select(xref_id:author_mismatch)
```
